s.text: The Croatian Constitution dictates that Parliament Speaker Vlatko Pavletic will serve as interim president until a new leader is selected.
The paper indicates that Bradley received mild electrical shocks to treat his arrhythmia on three occasions prior to 1998.
The LAT reefers the story but notes that health questions dogged the late Sen.
